title: What is the tennis schedule in Hamburg & Geneva?
description: Some of the biggest stars on the ATP Tour will be in action Wednesday across the Bitpanda Hamburg Open and the Gonet Geneva Open. Top seed Alexander Zverev will continue his pursuit of a home title against Alexandre Muller, while Novak Djokovic and top seed Taylor Fritz will compete in Geneva. View the full Wednesday order of play for Hamburg and Geneva below. ORDER OF PLAY - WEDNESDAY, 21 MAY 2025 BITPANDA HAMBURG OPEN Centre Court - start 12:00 Roberto Bautista Agut (ESP) vs [2] Frances Tiafoe (USA) [3] Andrey Rublev vs [WC] Justin Engel (GER) Not Before 16:00 [1] [WC] Alexander Zverev (GER) vs Alexandre Muller (FRA) Not Before 18:00 Giovanni Mpetshi Perricard (FRA) vs [6] Felix Auger-Aliassime (CAN) M1 - start 12:00  Jiri Lehecka (CZE) vs [4] Francisco Cerundolo (ARG) Not Before 13:30 [5] Alejandro Davidovich Fokina (ESP) vs Flavio Cobolli (ITA) Luciano Darderi (ITA) vs [7] Brandon Nakashima (USA) Not Before 17:00 Christian Harrison (USA) / Evan King (USA) vs [2] Kevin Krawietz (GER) / Tim Puetz (GER) M2 - start 11:00 [1] Harri Heliovaara (FIN) / Henry Patten (GBR) vs Sander Gille (BEL) / Jan Zielinski (POL) Not Before 13:00 Camilo Ugo Carabelli (ARG) vs Tomas Martin Etcheverry (ARG) Jamie Murray (GBR) / Rajeev Ram (USA) vs [WC] Andreas Mies (GER) / Patrick Zahraj (GER) Julian Cash (GBR) / Lloyd Glasspool (GBR) vs [3] Simone Bolelli (ITA) / Andrea Vavassori (ITA) GONET GENEVA OPEN Center Court - start 11:30 [1] Taylor Fritz (USA) vs Quentin Halys (FRA) Not Before 13:00 [4] Karen Khachanov vs Kei Nishikori (JPN) 75 25 Arthur Rinderknech (FRA) vs [6] Hubert Hurkacz (POL) Not Before 18:00 Marton Fucsovics (HUN) vs [2] Novak Djokovic (SRB) [Q] Cameron Norrie (GBR) vs [3] Tomas Machac (CZE) Court 1 - start 11:00 Jakob Schnaitter (GER) / Mark Wallner (GER) vs [2] Yuki Bhambri (IND) / Robert Galloway (USA) Not Before 12:30 [Q] Sebastian Ofner (AUT) vs Nuno Borges (POR) [8] Matteo Arnaldi (ITA) vs Fabian Marozsan (HUN) [5] Alexei Popyrin (AUS) vs Jacob Fearnley (GBR) Court 2 - start 11:00 Santiago Gonzalez (MEX) / Austin Krajicek (USA) vs Sadio Doumbia (FRA) / Fabien Reboul (FRA) Not Before 12:00 Francisco Cabral (POR) / Lucas Miedler (AUT) vs Rohan Bopanna (IND) / Adam Pavlasek (CZE) 51 [1] Marcelo Arevalo (ESA) / Mate Pavic (CRO) vs Alexander Erler (AUT) / Constantin Frantzen (GER) [WC] Jakub Paul (SUI) / Dominic Stricker (SUI) vs Ariel Behar (URU) / Joran Vliegen (BEL) 23 [NEWSLETTER FORM]

Tournament News

View full Tuesday order of play

May 19, 2025

Witters

The Bitpanda Hamburg Open is an ATP 500 event in Germany. By ATP Staff

The Bitpanda Hamburg Open and Gonet Geneva Open continue Tuesday with players in action including Frances Tiafoe, Gael Monfils, Karen Khachanov and Kei Nishikori.

In Hamburg, second seed Tiafoe will begin his run against Buyunchaokete and Monfils will take on fifth seed Alejandro Davidovich Fokina. Khachanov and Nishikori will face one another in Geneva.

View the full Tuesday order of play for Hamburg and Geneva below.

ORDER OF PLAY - TUESDAY, 20 MAY 2025

BITPANDA HAMBURG OPEN
Centre Court - start 12:00 
[LL] Vitaliy Sachko (UKR) vs Flavio Cobolli (ITA)
Buyunchaokete (CHN) vs [2] Frances Tiafoe (USA)
[5] Alejandro Davidovich Fokina (ESP) vs Gael Monfils (FRA)

Not Before 18:00
Daniel Altmaier (GER) vs [6] Felix Auger-Aliassime (CAN)

M1 - start 11:00 
Andre Goransson (SWE) / Sem Verbeek (NED) vs Andres Molteni (ARG) / Fernando Romboli (BRA)

Not Before 12:00
Tomas Martin Etcheverry (ARG) vs Francisco Comesana (ARG)
[8] Sebastian Baez (ARG) vs Camilo Ugo Carabelli (ARG)
Giovanni Mpetshi Perricard (FRA) vs Alexander Bublik (KAZ)

M2 - start 13:00 
Manuel Guinard (FRA) / Hugo Nys (MON) vs Joe Salisbury (GBR) / Neal Skupski (GBR)
[WC] Justin Engel (GER) / Max Hans Rehberg (GER) vs Nathaniel Lammons (USA) / Jackson Withrow (USA)
[4] Nikola Mektic (CRO) / Michael Venus (NZL) vs [Q] Sander Arends (NED) / Luke Johnson (GBR)

GONET GENEVA OPEN
Center Court - start 11:30
[Q] Karue Sell (BRA) vs Fabian Marozsan (HUN)
Arthur Rinderknech (FRA) vs Miomir Kecmanovic (SRB)
[WC] Arthur Cazaux (FRA) vs [6] Hubert Hurkacz (POL)

Not Before 18:00
[4] Karen Khachanov vs Kei Nishikori (JPN)
[Q] Sebastian Ofner (AUT) vs Nuno Borges (POR)

Court 1 - start 13:00
[WC] Jakub Paul (SUI) / Dominic Stricker (SUI) vs Ariel Behar (URU) / Joran Vliegen (BEL)

Not Before 14:30
Francisco Cabral (POR) / Lucas Miedler (AUT) vs Rohan Bopanna (IND) / Adam Pavlasek (CZE)
